name: Tap Adventure - idle Game
description:
Feel the great power of magic in your fingers.
Embark on an exciting adventure in search of fame and prizes, together with a team of fearless Heroes.
And may the lightning fast TAP be with you!

KEY FEATURES:

• 7 ​basic character classes, each with unique skills and choices in development;
• 2​0 epic bosses and a myriad of monsters
• 7​ diverse colorful worlds
• valuable rewards for defeating bosses
• 1​40 pieces of gear and weapons for the characters
• b​rilliant graphics and spectacular effects
• A​nd a lot of gold, heaps of gold!

On the way to the magnificent city Ageron you must pass through thick forest, sleeping swamps, dense​ j​ungle, gold mines, timeless glaciers, and lifeless wasteland. Be prepared for anything, because the marshes and swamps are inhabited by evil goblins and ogres; vicious predators and wild brownies hide in the forests, and bloodthirsty tribes of natives and baboons fill the jungle. L​ocal inhabitants don't like intruders: the only way to get past i​s to fight them!
Your main weapon and defense — a blinding quick TAP! With one movement of your finger you can summon lightning down on the heads of your enemies, make heroes use their abilities, or enhance their equipment. Stop attacking monsters, collect gold, and find rare artifacts in Patchworld.​

A few tips for a successful battle:

A LEGENDARY TEAM
Choose among seven brave Heroes​ — e​very of them is worth a whole squad! Take the danger on your shoulders, with your faithful warriors and the power bestowed by the Creator, the Chief Tailor of the Patchworld.
Improve your basic skills and enhance your Heroes. Review tactics before fights with bosses and upgrade the required skills. The tide of battle depends on it!

AWARDS FOR VALOR
Collect award chests when you defeat bosses. They contain new outfits for your Heroes.

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Visit each incredible location with its diverse inhabitants and laws, and win available bonuses that boost your abilities and performance, increasing your chances of winning.

TRAVEL IN TIME
Create a Time Loop, to go back and get a valuable reward. Reset your skills and gain magic rune stones,​which create powerful artifacts, and bestow unprecedented power to fight your enemies.

COUNTLESS ENEMIES, INEXHAUSTIBLE TREASURES, AND ETERNAL GLORY​­ LIVE THE​DREAMS OF A REAL HERO!
